description: Fill in the blanks with a Thing or Person or Verb and create a story that borders on the absurd.  Each Adlib provides a huge dose of laughter with the right words...and sometimes even more with the wrong words!  Share in the laughter by emailing and text messaging your stories to friends.  And new Adlibs are downloaded whenever you play.  Or you can crack open a fortune cookie, provide just a few words, and let your personal fortune unfold.  If you have trouble thinking of an Adjective, you can send a request to a friend, someone who always seems to have the right word for everything.  When you forget the words, Adlib.
